explalantionView.title: Who is that?
explalantionView.description: Communicate anonymously with unknown users around you

locationPermissionView.title: Location permission
locationPermissionView.description: We need your location to find people around you

dialog.title: Location permission
dialog.description:
Kuzpot needs your location to work.
You can change this permission in the app settings.

notificationsPermissionView.title: Notifications permission
notificationsPermissionView.description: Activate notifications to know when someone sends you a message

dialog.title: Notifications permission
dialog.description:
If you want to receive notifications, you need to grant Kuzpot the permission to send them.
You can change this permission in the app settings.
